src:
Beredar Luas, Seperti Inikah Spesifikasi Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite?
04 Nov 2019, 04:48 by Mansur
Spesifikasi Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Beredar di Jagat Maya
Oketekno – Generasi penerus Samsung Galaxy S10 yang rencananya rilis awal tahun 2020 mendatang sudah mulai muncul di publik. Namun disamping itu, ada banyak informasi tentang versi lite dari ponsel itu juga, yakni Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite.
Dari pihak resmi sendiri tidak ada konfirmasi mengenai hal tersebut, akan tetapi kian hari bocoran tentang Galaxy S10 Lite semakin menguat saja. Baru-baru ini diketahui spesifikasi yang bakal ditanamkan juga mulai terpublish di Jagat Maya, dan semakin jelas saja.

Simak Nih: Spesifikasi Kunci Samsung Galaxy A90s Terungkap, Seperti Apa?

Walaupun diduga akan menyasak segmen pasar lebih rendah karena menggunakan embel-embel “Lite”, akan tetapi dalam rumor disebutkan kalau Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite akan tetap bertahan dengan chip Snapdragon 855, dan didukung oleh memori internal RAM hingga 8GB.


Copyright©MSPowerUser

Kemudian untuk panel layarnya sendiri juga tetap luas, dimana akan menggunakan panel Super AMOLED dengan luas 6.7 inci. Sedangkan untuk resolusinya yakni Full HD+, persis seperti model HP Samsung lainnya, termasuk Galaxy A70 salah satunya.

Ketahui Yuk: Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Samsung Galaxy A50s, Harga Mahal Bukan Jaminan?

Untuk kamera depan yang tertanamkan persis seperti Galaxy S10e, hanya ada 1 dan bakal diletakkan pada bagian lubang pada layar. Hanya saja resolusi dari kamera depannya itu lebih besar, yakni 32MP. Sedangkan untuk kamera belakangnya ada 3 lensa, masing-masing beresolusi 48MP + 12MP + 5MP. Untuk spesifikasi kameranya ini hampir mirip Vivo S1 Pro, kamera depan ataupun belakangnya.
Beralih ke sektor daya yang sudah muncul di jagat maya juga, disebutkan kalau Galaxy S10 Lite akan memiliki baterai berkapasitas 4.370 mAh dan didukung oleh teknologi pengisian daya cepat 45W. Dan untuk opsi warna yang bakal ditawarkan yakni Biru, Hitam, dan Putih.
Walaupun spesifikasi Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite sudah tersebar luas di Jagat Maya, akan tetapi untuk harga hingga jadwal rilisnya masih belum terungkap. Diperkirakan Samsung baru meluncurkannya bulan Desember 2019 mendatang. So, kita nantikan saja perkembangan informasi berikutnya.
baca juga: Sederet HP Samsung Ini Lagi Diskon Jutaan Rupiah, Cek Daftarnya Disini!
text:
Broad Circulation, Is This the Specifications of Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite?
Nov 04 2019, 04:48 by Mansur
Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Specifications Circulating at Jagat Maya
Oketekno - The next generation of Samsung Galaxy S10 which is planned to be released in early 2020 has started to appear in public. But besides that, there is a lot of information about the lite version of the phone as well, namely the Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite.
From the official side there is no confirmation about it, but the leakage of Galaxy S10 Lite is getting stronger every day. It is only recently known that the specifications that will be implanted have also begun to be published in Jagat Maya, and are increasingly clear.

Check out: Key Specifications of Samsung Galaxy A90s Revealed, Like What?

Although it is suspected that it will tease lower market segments because it uses the "Lite" appendage, rumors say that the Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite will stay with the Snapdragon 855 chip, and is supported by internal RAM memory up to 8GB.


Copyright © MSPowerUser

Then for the screen panel itself also remains broad, which will use a Super AMOLED panel with an area of 6.7 inches. As for the resolution that is Full HD +, exactly like other Samsung HP models, including the Galaxy A70 one of them.

Let's Know: Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Samsung Galaxy A50s, Expensive Price Is Not a Guarantee?

For the front camera that is embedded exactly like the Galaxy S10e, there is only 1 and will be placed in the hole on the screen. It's just that the resolution of the front camera is bigger, which is 32MP. As for the rear camera there are 3 lenses, each with a resolution of 48MP + 12MP + 5MP. For the specifications of this camera is almost similar to the Vivo S1 Pro, front or rear camera.
Turning to the power sector that has appeared in the virtual universe as well, it is said that the Galaxy S10 Lite will have a capacity of 4,370 mAh battery and is supported by 45W fast charging technology. And for the color options that will be offered namely Blue, Black, and White.
Although the specifications of the Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite are widespread in Jagat Maya, the price of the release schedule has not yet been revealed. It is estimated that the new Samsung will launch in December 2019. So, we just look forward to the development of the next information.
